description: The South March Highlands are a network of trails maintained by the Ottawa Mountain Biking Association, but frequently used for hiking, walking, fatbiking, mountain biking and snowshoeing.  OMBA has done a great job maintaining the bike trails, but in doing so, they have made the trails much more technical than the average rider might expect.
directions: There are several trailheads along Second Line Road at the intersections of Klondike, Brady and others.
title: South March Highlands
